node_c Module

A node that subscribes to the robot’s position and velocity (using the custom message from /node_a_info) and prints the distance of the robot from the target and the robot’s average speed.

The node uses a parameter des_rate_c to set how fast it publishes the information.

Topics

Subscribes to:

  • /node_a_info

Goal actions:

  • /reaching_goal_c

node_c.clbk_function(msg)[source]

Callback function for the /node_a_info topic subscription, reading the published information on position and velocity and calculating the distance to goal and average velocity, on both directions x and y.

Parameters:

msg (vinicius_assignment_2_rt1.msg.node_a_msg) – The message received from the publisher containing data for Pose and Twist.

node_c.desired_pos(goal)[source]

Function used on the simple action server /reaching_goal_c. Sets the desired position of the goal.

Parameters:

goal (assignment_2_2022.msg.PlanningAction) – The request object containing the target_pose attribute.

node_c.main()[source]

Main function of the node. Initializes the node and sets up the action server, as well as subscribing to /node_a_info topic. Sets up the frequency in which the information is posted on the console.
